scripts.network: npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=4200 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run local-services" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:happ: hc s clean && echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/happ/team-mates.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network -b http://127.0.0.1:54000 webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:55000
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir/happ --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir/happ --recursive
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir/happ --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.sweetest: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.clean: npx rimraf target && npx rimraf .cargo && npx rimraf Cargo.lock && npx rimraf flake.lock
scripts.clean:ui: npx --quiet rimraf package-lock.json node_modules ui/node_modules ui/.angular ui/dist && npx --quiet rimraf tests/node_modules
